creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: three pieces sewn together; outer pieces are blue and red striped; central pieces are dark blue with thin stripes in light blue, yellow, red and green; short twisted and knotted fringe; red, white and cream cording at short sides; two blue stripes on one outer piece embellished with short lines of beads:  red, yellow, black, blue and white
title: Man's wrapper or skirt
